activeUnitCount().details: Returns the active compute unit count

addPaymentTokenToWhitelist(address).details: Adds payment token address to whitelist

epochTimestamp(uint256).details: Returns timestamp of the given epoch

fltCollateralPerUnit().details: Returns the flt collateral per compute unit for creating CC

fltPrice().details: Returns the last set flt price in usd/flt

fltPriceAtEpoch(uint256).details: Returns the flt price at the end of the epoch previous to given one.It means that this function will always return the same result for the same arguments.Epoch must be less or equal than current epoch.

getRewardPool(uint256).details: Returns the reward pool per epoch

isPaymentTokenAllowed(address).details: Checks if address is allowed to use as payment token in deals/offers

lastPriceSetting().details: Gets last set flt price in usd/flt and timestamp of the last stored price

maxCUPerCommitment().details: Returns the max number of CU in CC

maxDuration().details: Returns the max duration of CC in Epochs

maxFailedRatio().details: Returns the max failed ratio for CC

maxProofsPerEpoch().details: Returns the max randomX proofs per epoch

maxProtocolVersion().details: Returns max protocol version which can be specified in offers and deals

maxRewardPerEpoch().details: Returns the max reward pool per epoch

maxUnitCountPerProvider().details: Returns max unit count allowed for single provider to have in all offers combined

minCUPerCommitment().details: Returns the min number of CU in CC

minDealDepositedEpochs().details: Returns min deposited Epochs constant for new deals

returns._0: min deposited Epochs for new deals

minDealRematchingEpochs().details: Returns min rematching Epochs constant for all deals

returns._0: min rematching Epochs for all deals

minDuration().details: Returns the min duration of CC in Epochs

minProofsPerEpoch().details: Returns the min required randomX proofs per epoch for the 1 CU.If lower than this - CU is failed and CC slashed.

minProtocolVersion().details: Returns min protocol version which can be specified in offers and deals

minRewardPerEpoch().details: Returns the min reward pool per epoch

precision().details: Returns precision for decimal values (USD, percentage)

randomXProxy().details: Returns the randomX proxy address for verification of randomX proofs

removePaymentTokenFromWhitelist(address).details: Removes payment token address from whitelist

setCapacityConstant(uint8,uint256).details: Sets a constant with a uint256 value

slashingRate().details: Returns the slashing rate for failed CU

usdCollateralPerUnit().details: Returns the usd collateral per compute for creating CC

usdTargetRevenuePerEpoch().details: Returns the target revenue in usd value per epoch

vestingPeriodDuration().details: Returns the vesting duration for one period in Epochs

withdrawEpochsAfterFailed().details: Returns the delay for withdraw collateral in Epochs after failed CC
